attributes.action: George Osborne should resign as MP over appointment as editor of LES
attributes.additional_details:
- The London Evening Standard has appointed George Osborne as their editor. 
- This salary is unknown. 
- George Osborne is the MP for Tatton
- He has said he will continue as MP for Tatton, which he gets a salary of almost £75,000 for 

News article is: 
http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-39304944
attributes.background:
If George Osborne wants to take up his position as editor of the London Evening Standard he should resign as MP for Tatton
- It is inappropriate for him to be the editor of a London paper while being MP for Tatton, Cheshire
- Constituents would be under represented
- He shouldn't get an MP salary

rejection.details:
Complaints about breaches of the House of Commons Code of Conduct are investigated by the Parliamentary Commissioner for Standards, who is independent of Parliament and Government. You can find out more about the Commissioner and her role here:

http://www.parliament.uk/pcs
